SUSTAINABILITY
Growing our positive impact for people and the 
planet is at the core of who we are as a company 
and helps to deliver our business growth with 
positive change in the world.  
Smart and sustainable use of natural resources is 
necessary now more than ever. As a global food 
company, it is vital to secure sustainable supplies 
of key raw materials by empowering farmers and 
their communities to become more productive 
and climate-smart. 
That is why we continue to focus on where we can 
make the biggest impact to reduce our end-to-
end environmental impact.  
We’re sourcing our ingredients more sustainably 
and in ways that reduce deforestation in our 
supply chain. We’re producing our snacks 
with less energy, water and waste, and with 
ingredients people know and feel good about. 
And we’re staying at the forefront in the fight 
against climate change with science-based 
targets to reduce CO2 emissions from our own 
manufacturing.
We continue to build on our heritage of 
leadership in sustainability—a heritage which 
includes being the first company to go beyond 
third-party certification by taking direct 
accountability for building a sustainable cocoa 
supply via Cocoa Life ; and to require palm 
oil suppliers to adopt forest protection and 
sustainability policies for their entire supply 
base, not just palm oil supplied to Mondelēz 
International. 
Overall, we’re pleased with our progress from the 
past three years.
